description: This file declares the interface for a Zigbee fan control cluster, including callback structures, create functions, setters/getters, and string representations for fan modes.
external_methods: bool fanControlClusterGetFanMode(const ZigbeeCluster *cluster, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint8_t *mode)
bool fanControlClusterSetFanMode(const ZigbeeCluster *cluster, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint8_t mode)

methods.name: fanControlClusterCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes a fan control cluster instance with specified callbacks and context.

methods.name: fanControlClusterSetBindingEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables binding for the fan control cluster on a specified device configuration context.

methods.name: fanControlClusterGetFanMode
methods.description: Retrieves the current fan mode for a specified cluster, EUI64, and endpoint.

methods.name: fanControlClusterSetFanMode
methods.description: Sets the fan mode for a specified cluster, EUI64, and endpoint.

methods.name: fanControlClusterGetFanModeString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of a given fan mode.

ctags.name: fanModeChanged
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint8_t mode,const void * ctx)

fields.name: void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint8_t mode,const void * ctx) fanModeChanged
